entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:45 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -35.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Aupaluk Airport 03:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -35.1°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -38.7°C
Wind: S 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
